title: What is the Relationship Between Physical Light and Spiritual Enlightenment in Ancient Egyptian Beliefs?
first_phrase: This text discusses the incompatibility of physical light and spiritual form. Prior paragraphs explain that light prevents the perfect separation and independence of the two universal principles in humans, intelligence, and material necessity, resulting in their amalgamation within physical light. The last 200 tokens delve into how the Intelligent Light of hidden forms and spirits in the universe is infertile to any physical light, leading to a lack of intellectual form. It draws upon ancient Egyptian symbolism to explain how Lucifero only appears after a night of darkness and before materialized light.
content: Che la Luce Intelligente delle occulte forme e degli occulti spiriti della natura occulta dell'Universo e' infeconda alla luce solare o luce fisica di qualunque specie e quindi da' la più' completa mancanza delle forme di origine intellettuale perciò' nell'antico simbolismo egizio fu detto che Osiride, il Sole occulto dell'Intelletto governa le 12 ore notturne con 12 geni, il cui maggiore e' Horus che combatte contro il male - perciò' il Lucifero o il bel demone apportatore della divina luce non appare che alla fine di una notte di tenebre, e precedente gli albori della luce della materia per materializzarsi.
last_phrase: In summary, the practice of our masters' teachings will equip you with the means to test these dogmas and truths for yourself. However, it is essential to remember that blind faith in doctrines and traditions is not enough. Instead, believe in only what your own research and experience demonstrate to be true and beneficial for your well-being and that of others. The knowledge enshrined in our hieratic science has been regarded by many as either an illusion or a matter of faith.
